messages.content: David Cameron and George Osborne give me nightmares. The Tories have shown us time and time again how little they care about people like you and me.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposes Conservative plans to cut hospitals and schools.

mentions.tacticalSituation: On 7th May it will be a clear fight between the Liberal Democrats and Tories in many parts of the country. That's why Labour voters like me are switching to back the Liberal Democrats to keep the Tories out.

issues.health: The Tories can't be trusted with the NHS or with our children's schools. Liberal Democrats oppose Tory health and education cuts.

leaflet.personalStatement: I used to be an active member of the Labour Party — I even stood as a candidate once — but I know that I have to vote Lib Dem to beat the Conservatives where I live.

politicalExperience.role: Former Member of the Labour Party

endorsements.endorsement: Maria Cole encourages Labour voters to switch to the Liberal Democrats to defeat the Conservatives.

quotes.text: Liberal Democrats are the real alternative to five more years of Cameron and Osborne in government.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Maria Cole expresses her concerns about Conservative policies and voices her support for Liberal Democrats as the strategic choice to defeat them.
